thread.title: Behold Your Snow Dogs* 2024 Vol. TWO
thread.title_full: Behold Your Snow Dogs* 2024 Vol. TWO

author: Prince
title: Behold Your Snow Dogs* 2024 Vol. TWO
text: If you missed the magnficient Volume One, you can see them [here](https://www.popville.com/2024/01/first-snow-dogs-of-2024-vol-one/). “This is Josie in Petworth comin’ in hot during some snow fetch” Many, many more snow dogs after the jump. “This is Rolly. He’s only been in DC (Barnaby Woods) for 48 hours (and on the planet for 8 weeks!) but he thinks we’ve got the best weather anywhere!” “Noosa and shadow Park View” “Manzi with frozen whiskers in Fort Reno, Tenleytown. Coming from Mozambique – this is his first proper snow!” “Forest playing in the snow at Meridian Hill/Malcom X park” “Skully at Pierce Mill!” “Tracer enjoying the weather!” “This is Banana from Petworth! (@banana_in_a_bandana on IG)” “Zadie at Difficult Run” “Angus’s first snow!” “Tilly enjoying the snow at Volta Park in Georgetown” “This is Bentley from SW Wharf! @helloitsbentley_” “George in Shaw is not a fan of the snow today haha!” “Weller the Boykin Enjoying Rock Creek Park” “Fergie in Petworth” “Frankie, Georgetown” “Coco from Pentagon City” “Spritz from Kingman Park” “Lila, Just poking around NoMa” “Tazzie in Capitol Hill” “Romeo, National Cathedral” “Violet the Spring Rd snow-dog” “Nelly in Takoma Park” “Finn, of Bloomingdale!” “Finn’s sister, Phoebe (not of bloomingdale)” *You can send your snow dogs (cats, rabbits, who knows) to [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection) and let me know your pet’s name and what neighborhood you are in. Thanks! There is a very long queue but I promise all will, eventually, be posted. Recent Stories Thanks to Rory, Sharon, and Mahogany for sending from Petworth. Friends of the White Whale Society is brought to you by the team behind Hawks*** around Town. You can email… “Dear PoPville, Frankie in Georgetown looks very much like our Winnie the Poodle in Hill East. We’d really love to bring these two together, If you have any animal/pet photos you’d like to share please send an email to princeofpetworth(at)gmail(dot)com with ‘Animal Fix’ in the title and say the name of your pet and… 14th and Irving St, NW Thanks to guacamolly for sharing: “not sure if anyone’s mentioned this yet – I got verbal confirmation from a pharmacist that the Columbia Heights CVS… An electrifying evening of drag extravagance featuring sensational performances from Rupaul’s Drag Race All Stars 6 Winner Kylie Sonique Love, Vanessa Vanjie Matteo, Mistress Isabelle Brooks and Luxx Noir London! Your beloved D.C. queens- Cake Pop!, Crystal Edge, Dreux Sidora and Crimsyn- open the show. Afterwards, LET LOOSE and dance the night away to infectious disco house beats spun by NYC’s DJ Boyyyish until closing. Purple looks are encouraged! Start the year off right by helping support a wonderful not-for-profit organization in the Nation’s Capital for our first fundraiser of 2024! Join us for a festive celebration, dedicated to some of the finest melodies of the operatic cannon and the holiday season. Maestro Julien Benichou will bring his infectious energy as he leads the WOS Chamber Ensemble in an evening you will be sure to remember. We cordially invite you to Carderock Falls Manor to enjoy an intimate holiday celebration in Woof Trap Theater, where an inedible experience of musical enchantment awaits you. This evening will feature the following outstanding WOS opera stars: Juliette Di Bello, Jason Karn, Manuela Tomaz Korossy, and Kristin Sampson; with narration provided by Robin Phillips. [ Vanderpump Rules Season 11 Premiere Party ](https://www.popville.com/events/vanderpump-rules-season-11-premiere-party-6782/) Vanderpump Rules Season 11 Premiere Party This is the moment we’ve been waiting for! Lisa is back with another season of Vanderpump Rules, and we’re ready to celebrate in a big way with a viewing party for season 11! Expect [ Jan 30 – Project Mayhem Live at Pearl Street Warehouse ](https://www.popville.com/events/jan-30-project-mayhem-live-at-pearl-street-warehouse-6754/) Experience sonic thunder with Project Mayhem! 🎸 Secure your spot now for just $15 in advance or $18 at the door. 🎟️ Dive into a near life experience as Arlington Magazine labels them “subversive.” Rock out to hits from Arctic
